History.prompt: What is the history of this title?

Creation.prompt: How was this title created? Who held it first?

Notable Holders.prompt: Any notable holders? What did they do? Were they notable for any event or for being bad/good?

Requirements.prompt: What are the requirements to be able to hold or run for this role? Are there restrictions? Based on what? (gender, status, culture, religion, ...)

Appointment and Succession.prompt: Who appoints this role? How does succession work?

Term Limit.prompt: Is there a term limit? Has it changed before? What happens when the term ends?

Duties and Responsibilities.prompt: What are the duties and responsibilities of this role?

Removal or Dismissal.prompt: How can a holder be removed or dismissed? Are there any precedents?

Status and Authority.prompt: What is the basis of the authority of this role? Who and what does it rule? Are there titles/roles beneath them? Does the role bring other titles and privileges?

Cultural Significance.prompt: How does this role influence culture and society? How is it viewed?

Criticism.prompt: Is there criticism against this post? By whom and on what basis?
